project_abstract.cdata: The primary objectives of the Emergency Transport and Mine Clearing Project are to: a) repair and reconstruct the surface transport networks within Croatia and between Croatia and Bosnia Herzegovina; and b) clear landmines in areas of high economic priority for reconstruction. The project consists of two components. The transport component includes roads and bridges, railways, and Ploce port. The mine clearing component includes, initial screening, surveys, training, clearing of areas, and quality assurance.
